comments:
I think that the following debug exception should not be logged. It was handled 
and does not seem to be a bug
Maybe the message that the configuration id does not exist is still needed but 
the exception isn't.

agreed, the message is needed, but the exception should not be logged.
Moving to Platform Debug

We have several bugs around this issue. The debug UI logs errors when an error 
dialog is displayed. This is sometimes useful, and sometimes overkill. Marking 
as later.

Fixed. Added a status code for missing launch config type. Only log warning 
message when missing type. Message is logged from LaunchManager#isValid(...)
*** Bug 39050 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

traces.message: Launch configuration type id "org.eclipse .pde.junit.launchconfig" does not exist. Possible causes:         Missing specification of a launch type (missing plugin)         Incorrect launch configuration XML
